title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 413 - Returns, Payment Of Tax And Records To Be Kept
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 413 - Returns, Payment Of Tax And Records To Be Kept

State Regulations
§ 413.1 - Returns of tax on motor fuel
§ 413.2 - Payment of tax
§ 413.3 - Timely filing/timely payment
§ 413.4 - Records to be kept by distributors and others
§ 413.5 - Information returns

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 413

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art. 12-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
